abstract: About 1,500 Mormons travel to Salt Lake City to publicly resign from Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints after church issues strict new policies declaring same-sex couples heretics and restricting their children from baptism.
lead_paragraph: More than 1,000 members joined a mass resignation from the church in Salt Lake City, a decision that many said can be complicated, both administratively and emotionally.

headline.main: Mormon Resignations Put Support for Gays Over Fealty to Faith
headline.print_headline: In Resignations, Mormons’ Support for Gays Surmounts Fealty to Faith

snippet: More than 1,000 members joined a mass resignation from the church in Salt Lake City, a decision that many said can be complicated, both administratively and emotionally.
